page.title: 05PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Constituted in 1894 along with all other Parish councils,five parish councillors being elected at the first Parish meeting held on December 4th of that year.In April 1897 The Parish room was opened and it is here (now called the social centre) that all Parish council meetings are held. It now has a chairman and six other Councillors elected every 4 years,and it meets every other month; although special meetings can be called. Two members of the council have each served over forty years. It is not a planning authority but has the chance to comment on any planning application in the Village.Responsibilities_ Street lighting , structure and insuring of the Social Centre and the upkeep of the recreation ground.A part time clerk is employed to record minutes,prepare agendas,write letters.
